meanings.definition: Of or relating to the cheek or jaw.
meanings.sent1: Her genal smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her genal area for any swelling.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his genal muscles got a workout from all the talking.
meanings.sent4: The genal structure of the building resembled a smiling face.
meanings.sent5: The genal pain from the punch was sharp and immediate.

meanings.sent1: The archaeologist discovered a fossilized genal in the excavation site.
meanings.sent2: The genal was carefully preserved for further study.
meanings.sent3: The museum displayed the ancient genal with pride.
meanings.sent4: The genal was the missing piece in the skeletal puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The genal bone was surprisingly intact despite its age.
